id: scenario-value-scanner-young-adult-scenarios-household-roommate household operates as miniature care economy
title: Roommate household operates as miniature care economy
description: Roommate household operates as miniature care economy
content:
Scenario: Roommate household operates as miniature care economy
    Given Aisha lives with roommates
    And the household functions as a care economy unit
    When household care tokens are calculated
    Then all forms of household labor should be valued
    And cooking, cleaning, shopping, and maintenance should all count
    And emotional labor of household coordination should be recognized
    And care tokens should enable equitable exchange
    And the household should function as mutual support network
    And care economy principles should prevent household exploitation
